Articles.Content:
So i had just loged on to my computer when there was an update to KSP(away with words came out minutes before this). so i installed it. but the game crashed again and again durring the loading session(when it was loading part upgrades). i removed all mods and it still did it. so i reinstalled it and now it just wont load past part upgrades. then after about two minutes of nothing the screen goes black. and it doesn't crash or not respod(spent about the whole time cliking on the screen to see if it did) idk if this is everyone but me. 

 

 

also i just cleaned out my computer and KSP had been running great latly on above avrage graphics settings (idk if this helps)

 

last crash file:

mono.dll caused an Access Violation (0xc0000005)
  in module mono.dll at 0023:100704db.

Error occurred at 2017-05-25_182224.
C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Kerbal Space Program\KSP.exe, run by Sam.
67% memory in use.
3977 MB physical memory [1283 MB free].
0 MB paging file [0 MB free].
0 MB user address space [2496 MB free].
Read from location 00000000 caused an access violation.

Context:
EDI:    0x385c0510  ESI: 0x00000000  EAX:   0x002ce548
EBX:    0x41e29b80  ECX: 0x385c0510  EDX:   0x00000067
EIP:    0x100704db  EBP: 0x002ce54c  SegCs: 0x00000023
EFlags: 0x00010212  ESP: 0x002ce498  SegSs: 0x0000002b

Bytes at CS:EIP:
ff 36 ff 75 08 e8 0f f9 ff ff 50 56 53 89 45 0c
If getting it from the KSP store try a clean install. If using Steam try verifying the local cache of the game.
And if you are running mods, don't.  Mods haven't been updated yet

im not running any mods. and i tried verifying the integrity of game files and it said it was fine, but the game still crashes on loading part upgrades. i think if there is more parts the files might be so massive that my computer cant handle it(I have a Dell something computer that was handed down from my dad who used it at work so idk id thats good to run ksp).
